body.name: Toy Dolls-Absolutely Live
body.description: CD/DVD combo filmed and recorded live at the Tivoli Utrecht Holland on 20th November 2004. The classic oddball punkers kicking out all the hits!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CAN NEVER GO WRONG WITH THE TOY DOLLS
reviews.reviewText: this is a great live combo budget issue of the classic toy dolls live from 2004 in the netherlands, i know this dvd has been available before but i either missed the cd 10 years ago or this is the first time the audio part of this is being released im not 100% sure on that, anyway i am glad i bought this cheap budget release as the toy dolls sound the same in 2014 as they did 35 years ago in 1979 when they started, olgy is the main force behind the toy dolls like lemmy has been the main force behind motorhead ( not that you can compare the toy dolls to motorhead) i do remember something about a 25th ann tour a decade or so ago so that must have been the tour this was recorded during, the songs are all typical punchy toy dolls songs, they play most of the 80s classics that most toy dolls fans want to hear and the set is very tight, i have an old vhs tape of the toy dolls i bought about 30 years ago in 1986 and this dvd that comes here in this package is as good as the footage from 1984 and 85, nothing ever changed with this band as i said before except the line ups but as long as you got olgy on the mic then you got the toy dolls, the dvd is awesome!!!! very powerful energetic classic punk rock i am very pleased this came out in this format and for the price you just cant beat this, i have been a fan of this band for almost 3 decades now and i am so glad that olgy still brings the dolls out for a few gigs a year, sadly there touring days seem to be over but hey it is expensive to tour so i can understand why the toy dolls just come out for big festivals and stuff like that now, anyway i am very pleased the toy dolls are still rocking in 2014, i liked there last studio effort a few years back and i hope to see them live again someday as i have not seen these guys live since 1986 now when they opened for the dickies at the old ritz in nyc back in 1986, anyway if you like this band for the price HOW CAN YOU NOT GET THIS PACKAGE??????????????????????? this dvd is as good as the ten years of toys live album from 1990..

HO PROVATO A RIPRODURRE IL DVD SU UN BLU RAY SAMSUNG E UN DVD PLAYER PHILIPS, IN ENTRAMBI I CASI DICE CHE NON E' RIPRODUCIBILE NELLA REGIONE, L'AZIENDANEL TENTATIVO DI ACCAPARRARSI TUTTO IL MERCATO STA COLLEZIONANDO UNA SERIE DI BRUTTE FIGURE CHE MI PORTANO A RESTITUIRE ALMENO IL 50% DEGLI ACQUISTI. DATEVI UNA REGOLATA.

reviews.reviewTitle: Die Party kommt auch aus der Konserve an - Spaß pur!!!
reviews.reviewText: Wer die Toy Dolls live erlebt hat, wird sich an der CD sicher erfreuen.Ich fühle mich an die Konzerte erinnert. Der Funke springt bei mir beim Hören über.Am PC läuft die DVD ohne Probleme mit dem VLC-Player, im DVD-Player habe ich es noch nicht versucht.

CD excellent comme toujours avec les Toy Dolls, par contre, gros problème avec le DVD qui n'est pas lisible sur les lecteurs de la zone 2 or cela n'est pas mentionné dans l'annonce !!!!Pour ma part, je possédait déja le DVD (en zone 2) et je voulais me procurer la version CD uniquement disponible avec le DVD en plus donc pas trop grave; mais pour ceux qui n'ont pas le DVD et qui souhaitent l'avoir ce n'est pas cette version qu'il faut acheter !!!D'où ma note : 5 étoiles pour la prestation des Toy Dolls, 1 étoile pour la prestation d'amazon qui n'indique pas pour ses client que ce DVD ne sera pas lisible en zone 2. Ce qui fait une moyenne de 2,5 redescendu à 2 pour le manque d'indication de la part d'amazon !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 4, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: TOY DOLLS - WILD WHACKY AND LIVE.
reviews.reviewText: I am showing my age here but I have loved this band since the early eighties, this is just a re release of OUR LAST DVD which came out a while ago with the addition of the gig on cd, great packaging by secret but this will only really appeal to die hard collectors (like me) I don't know if adding the audio disc will tempt anyone else.The toy dolls are a great band / live act so you will be very entertained here but the fans are still wanting something new on the live front, the recent anniversary shows were a total riot so a dvd and cd collection culled from these shows would have been loads better.This is still worth the money as a stand alone release but i'm a die hard fan so was always gonna say that, the music as always is fast and furious, the musicianship and song writing top notch and the toy dolls as whacky as ever....!If you ever liked this band then buy this as it is worthy ammunition to any music fans arsenal....long live the toy dolls...cheerio and toodle pip.!
正にライブバンドのトイドールズですが、今回の作品はオルガのギターのミスが目立ちました。ただテンションは昔のままで、パンクロックのライブとして大変良かったです。
